description: PSTN (Public Switched Telephone Network) is generally known as Landline phone. A landline telephone (also known as mainline, home phone, landline, and fixed-line) is a phone that uses a metal wire or optical fiber telephone line for transmission as distinguished from a mobile cellular line, which uses radio waves for transmission. 2039 Establishment of digital Telephone Exchange Integrated Services Digital Network (ISDN).

sections.title: Tariff
sections.description: Please refer tariff section for details

faqs.question: What Charge should pay for subscribing to PSTN (Landline) Service?
faqs.answer: Please refer tariff section for details

faqs.question: How to check the amount to pay in PSTN Service.
faqs.answer: You can dial 1606 and follow IVR or you can Type CB*[e.g CB*014000000] and send SMS to 1415.

faqs.question: How to check the detailed bill for PSTN?
faqs.answer: You can go to http://gsmbl.ntc.net.np and check the detailed bill.

faqs.question: How do I complain when the PSTN line is not working?
faqs.answer: Please dial 198 and you can leave a complaint.
